items.content:
Hi Marion, 


Thanks for submitting a request for a full end-to-end live streaming consultation service from the MPO LIVE team.


As mentioned on MPO Livestream Support - FAQ for GBS and PMM, we require at least 2 week notice before the live event. Your request does not meet this requirement since this live stream starts in less than 2 days. Therefore we will not be able to provide end-to-end support in this case.

I also explained this to @Rosie Gee who contacted me on Lark regarding this case. I sent her some useful information and link she could use to help this client. Here is the message I wrote to Rosie:

Hi Rosie, thank you for your message. Our team, MPO LIVE, provides high-touch, end-to-end live streaming consultation for GBS and their key managed advertisers that go live on TT with Community Interaction to Live campaigns. MPO Livestream Support - FAQ for GBS and PMM


To request our full end-to-end livestreaming consultancy service, GBS CSM needs to fill out an Athena form here at least 2 weeks before your client goes live.


We are a small team of two, I'm in London and my teammate is in the US. We are currently at capacity due to fashion week and can't accept any new support requests for live streams happening before 12 March 2024.

You can learn more about CI to LIVE on the commdoc here vcp.to/cicommdoc


You can learn more about live in our FAQ doc here: vcp.to/faq


You can submit a request to allowlist your client by adding them to this spreadsheet here: vcp.to/citracker


Hope this information is useful.

-END OF MESSAGE TO ROSIE-

Unfortunately, we will not be able to provide further support to the information I shared above. 

Hope this is useful. 


Best regards, 

Itay

Indeed. Anyway, Ewan took care of their OBS LIVE access. So they have this feature open for them. However, 

I won't be able to provide any support other that the links I shared above. 

Best regards,

Itay

Hi Itay,


Thank you for your answer, seems impossible to me as well to do a livestream which such a thigh deadline...


Best,


Marion

items.label: Livestream Name (for internal use)

MPO's Livestream Consultation program is designed to cover the end-to-end experience of delivering a successful livestream. GBS must request support at least 2 weeks before the livestream to ensure we have adequate time and capacity to plan for your client's event.
Client Name
Client Region
Date of the livestream
Estimated start time of Livestream (please specify timezone)
Estimated planned duraion of Livestream (in minutes)
Concept and content of the livestream
items.content:
Hi Itay, 

This morning I received a message from Ewan Rowden regarding a livestream for Victoria Beckham.
The account is unmanaged.
They would like to go live and already had some access granted but when :
1) they do not have an ads manager (trying to fix an issue they have creating one)
2) I would need they ad account ID for TNS, MIE and OBS
3) Their production team is experienced
4) However, this is very very very last minute. 

Victoria Beckham is unmanaged because they get most of their traffic organically but having them on a livestream would be a 1st step to leverage paid for them.
I know the deadline is extremely tough.
Do you think that it would be possible despite how challenging it is...

Thank you so much,

Marion
